subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers exercised the option on Grady Little’s contract for the 2008 season and added a 2009 team option to his deal. He guided the Dodgers to an 88-74 record last season.
snippet: The Dodgers exercised the option on Grady Little’s contract for the 2008 season and added a 2009 team option to his deal. He guided the Dodgers to an 88-74 record last season.
